discourse_list.title: EIP1185: DNS resolver profile for ENS

content.content: I’ve created EIP 1185 which describes an ENS resolver profile for ENS.  This allows DNS resolvers to obtain information about ENS, and is used in EthDNS to resolve DNS records in Ethereum transparently.  Comments welcome. Link to the EIP: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/edit/master/EIPS/eip-137.md Explanation of EthDNS: https://medium.com/@jgm.orinoco/ethdns-an-ethereum-backend-for-the-domain-name-system-d52dabd904b3
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post has created EIP 1185, which describes an ENS resolver profile for ENS. The proposal allows DNS resolvers to obtain information about ENS and is used in EthDNS to resolve DNS records in Ethereum transparently. The author is asking for comments on the proposal. The post also includes a link to the EIP and an explanation of EthDNS.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: Hello, is there any interest in reviving this proposed EIP? Am very interested in it!
